text:
ロボットの少女が通りを歩いていると
少女は母親とはぐれた子供を見つけました
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: #FAB7A6;left: 1.42%;top: 6.17%;width: 46.83%;height: 6.41%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: #F38EAE;left: 67.42%;top: 10.56%;width: 22.00%;height: 3.91%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: #FAB7A6;left: 82.58%;top: 14.12%;width: 13.50%;height: 3.44%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text: 子供はボールを彼女の空洞の、金属の胸に弾ませた
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: #FAB7A6;left: 68.42%;top: 49.58%;width: 29.00%;height: 4.39%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text: 無理、君はロボット、僕は愛せない!
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: #F2693F;left: 0.25%;top: 68.56%;width: 46.67%;height: 3.80%;height: 3.20%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text: そう答えると、子供は歩き去った
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: #FAB7A6;left: 32.08%;top: 73.19%;width: 38.00%;height: 2.73%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;
